## MarkerManager class

Class to manage the multiple markers and the cursor on a workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MarkerManager 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `MarkerManager` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [LOCAL\_MARKER](./blockly.markermanager_class.local_marker_property.md) | <p><code>static</code></p><p><code>readonly</code></p> | (not declared) | The name of the local marker. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getCursor()](./blockly.markermanager_class.getcursor_1_method.md) |  | Get the cursor for the workspace. |
|  [getMarker(id)](./blockly.markermanager_class.getmarker_1_method.md) |  | Get a single marker that corresponds to the given ID. |
|  [registerMarker(id, marker)](./blockly.markermanager_class.registermarker_1_method.md) |  | Register the marker by adding it to the map of markers. |
|  [setCursor(cursor)](./blockly.markermanager_class.setcursor_1_method.md) |  | Sets the cursor and initializes the drawer for use with keyboard navigation. |
|  [unregisterMarker(id)](./blockly.markermanager_class.unregistermarker_1_method.md) |  | Unregister the marker by removing it from the map of markers. |
